Title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
Overview: When Dracula leaves the captive Jonathan Harker and Transylvania for London in search of Mina Murray, the reincarnation of Dracula's long-dead wife Elisabeta, obsessed vampire hunter Dr. Van Helsing sets out to end the madness.
Keywords: adultery, maze, vampire, bite, remake, rough sex, wake, religious conflict, bestiality, correspondence, vampire sex, autonomous shadow, vlad, fang vamp
production_companies: American Zoetrope, Columbia Pictures Corporation, Osiris Films
Cast: Gary Oldman, Winona Ryder, Anthony Hopkins
